synopsis.text:
Following a tragic accident in the Himalayas, Akira Fudou's body is possessed by the formidable demon, Devilman. Tasked with causing chaos and paving the way for a demonic invasion, Devilman's plans take an unexpected turn when he encounters Akira's childhood friend, Miki Makimura. Smitten by her courage and charm, Devilman develops a deep affection for humanity, much to the fury of his demon brethren and their leader, Zenon.

Now, Devilman, wielding the powers of a demon but retaining the soul of a man, stands as the sole protector of humanity against the relentless onslaught of Zenon's grotesque minions. Caught in a whirlwind of love, betrayal, and revenge, Devilman must safeguard his newfound love and humanity, all while concealing his true identity. Will love conquer evil, or will Devilman succumb to his demonic origins? Only time will tell in this thrilling tale of a reluctant hero.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
